venue.name: Evergreen at the Tall Grass Golf Course and Country Club

item.description:
August Scrapbook Event!

Please join us for an All Day Scrapbook Event on August 21, 2010 at the Tall Grass Golf Course and Country Club! Register today seats fill up quickly!

Refer a friend (someone not on original mailing list) and get a FREE Raffle ticket! Raffle basket worth over 50$!

Early Bird Registration gets a FREE Raffle Ticket!

ALL DAY 12 HOUR CROP
at Evergreen at
Tall Golf Course and Country Club

Youâ€™re invited to a 12 hour
Scrapbooking and Papercrafting event!

When: Saturday, August 21, 2010
Where: The Evergreen at the Tall Grass Golf Course and Country Club
24 Cooper Street
Shoreham, NY 11786
Time: 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Price: $40.00 includes coffee and light breakfast in the morning and dinner provided by Evergreen restaurant.
***CRICUT Station and Tool Table available for use***

Contact: Jodi Cahill at jocahill@optonline.net or (631) 379-8028

Jodi Cahill
55 Sherwood Drive

Please register by August 14, 2010. (Sorry no refunds after 8/14/10)
